The Burgdorf
a Waterfront Chateau
Vacation Home

We work very hard to bring to life our client's vision. In this case the client had a beautiful location right on the water. What they wanted was a home that would make them feel as if they were on vacation. I blended modern design with traits from traditional northern Italian villas to give them something unique. The floor plan was specifically designed to take advantage of the great water views.

LUXURY CUSTOM HOME THE Burgdorf
